items.description: Rapido offers competitive pricing on rides, making it a cost-effective choice for daily commuters. Promotional offers and referral bonuses further reduce costs, attracting budget-conscious riders.

items.title: Cashless Payments
items.description: Rapido supports a variety of cashless payment options, including credit/debit cards and mobile wallets, making transactions seamless and safe for users who prefer to avoid carrying cash.
